email.name: #1 - Welcome, Welcome!!!
email.subject: Welcome to TrainerDay! Time to Shift into Gear :bicyclist:‍:dash:
email.customHtml:
Hi {contactfield=firstname}! 

WELCOME
I’m Alex, founder of TrainerDay, and I’m thrilled to have you in our peloton! The whole reason our small but mighty team exists is to help you hit your goals and leave any performance roadblocks in the dust. We’ve got your back (and your legs!) covered.

PEDAL INTO SAVINGS:
It's cheaper on to buy on our website! 🚴‍♀️   Forget flat tires, avoid app store markups!

Website: $3.99/month (or $39.99/year)

App Stores: $4.99/month (depending on country/currency)

If you want to see how the premium version works in our mobile training
app.  Here is a simplied video to help.
https://youtu.be/0IhJAC6YzCA


FREEBIES FOR YOUR CYCLING TOOLKIT
Thousands of community workouts and training plans, all downloadable for FREE! Build your own plans, workouts, and libraries. Even better, you can load these into other apps like GoldenCheetah, all without spending a dime. Of course, if you want to use them in our app, you’ll need to upgrade—kind of like getting those aero wheels you've had your eye on. 😉


OUR PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION
Our app and website come loaded with features
The awesome Coach Jack Plan Builder
And plenty more to take your training to the next level
Don’t forget about our yearly discount: only $39.95 if you go all-in for the year. It’s the lowest price around—our version of an early breakaway!
See Pricing


MEET COACH JACK:
Think of Coach Jack as your personal cycling Yoda, minus the lightsaber. Created by world-renowned coach Andrea Morelli, it’s grounded in the latest science (because who wants outdated training methods?). Expect clear progressions, easier early intervals, and lots of Zone 2 time—until you're ready to crank things up.


FASTEST WARMUP EVER
Our mobile training app gets you warming up in 6 seconds flat! And it's super flexible, letting you tweak your workouts on the fly. Free users get 20 workouts, but you can mix and match them like gears for endless combinations.
Oh, and our iOS app works on M-Series Macs too. Extra bonus!
Download Now


TRAINERDAY + OTHER APPS
Zwift through the winter, crush outdoor rides with TrainerDay all season long. Sync your calendar to all major platforms and devices using TrainingPeaks (free or paid TP version).


JOIN THE PACK
Our forums are full of great advice, tips, and an always-helpful community. You can ask anything, and we’ll answer faster than you can sprint up a hill.       🏔️     Visit the Forum

HEAR IT FROM THE CREW
Here’s just one example of a happy rider in our forum! All our features and products are designed with direct feedback from awesome riders like you.


I am not here to spam your inbox—promise. You’ll only hear from me 4 times (including this email), except the occastional hot news!

You can reply to our emails anytime, and I’ll get back to you.

Ride on  ~Alex

 

{unsubscribe_text} | {webview_text}
